issue.title: 503 - Service Unavailable after approximately 15 minutes sending many HTTP requests to Hono
issue.body:
I wrote a programm which is simulating 10 sensornodes. Each of the sensornodes transmitts every second its sensor value via the HTTP adapter to Hono. Everything works fine but after approximately 15 minutes I get a 503 Service Unavailable message as reply.

After undeploying and then deploying docker swarm again it works fine again for the next approximately 15 minutes.

Does anyone have an idea why?
Help is appreciated! Thanks in advance!

issue.title: [#677] Free link resources after links are closed.

body:
@sysexcontrol Fix regarding links used in `HonoClient` is in #680. 
As the issue also involves other components (to a lesser degree), the corresponding places where Links are closed should be checked as well - that is still to be done.

@sysexcontrol I think we should not consider this fixed before we also have made sure that we also do not leak sessions and links from all the other places in the code where `HonoClientImpl` is not involved.
Also, I would like to stick to the pattern of letting the person who opened an issue also close it, if possible.
